Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
fft16384u YourInstanceName ( .xn_re(xn_re), // Bus [11 : 0] .xn_im(xn_im), // Bus [11 : 0] .start(start), .fwd_inv(fwd_inv), .fwd_inv_we(fwd_inv_we), .ce(ce), .clk(clk), .xk_re(xk_re), // Bus [26 : 0] .xk_im(xk_im), // Bus [26 : 0] .xn_index(xn_index), // Bus [13 : 0] .xk_index(xk_index), // Bus [13 : 0] .rfd(rfd), .busy(busy), .dv(dv), .edone(edone), .done(done));

Folder.label: VHDL Component Instantiation
